title: S
clause_text: S.R.S. shall be established in accordance with the orders issued vide G.R. mentioned in clauses 1 above. The Hutment dweller, for establishing his eligibility shall submit his application in prescribed form along with Annexure for Self Declaration and Self Declaration for Self Attestation and the copies of the documents of evidence in the manner as prescribed by State Government.
section: Provision relating to allotment of tenements either in situ or otherwise, on ownership or on rent to the other non-protected occupiers

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
